pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["从 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://cygwin.com","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://cygwin.com"}]," 上下载 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://cygwin.com/setup-x86.exe","rel":"nofollow","children":"setup-x86.exe"}]," 或 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://cygwin.com/setup-x86_64.exe","rel":"nofollow","children":"setup-x86_64.exe"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["选择",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Install from Internet"}],", 在"User URL"处输入以下地址："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"点击"Add"按钮，然后选中所添加的镜像，点击"下一步"进行安装。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"注意，该列表为可多选列表，注意把上面不需要的镜像点掉。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"pkgsrc","children":"pkgsrc"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["本节供 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/pkgsrc/","children":"pkgsrc 帮助"}],"使用。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"MASTER_SITE_CYGWIN= {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"}]]}]

meta.title: Cygwin 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
